text: Does anyone know where I can get daily temperature data for the UK (or ideally just London) that includes recent measurements? It was relatively straightforward to find data from 1960 to the end of 2019, but I struggle to find anything recent. Is weather data such a hot commodity?

elements.text: Does anyone know where I can get daily temperature data for the UK (or ideally just London) that includes recent measurements? It was relatively straightforward to find data from 1960 to the end of 2019, but I struggle to find anything recent. Is weather data such a hot commodity?

text:
I am pretty sure you can get it from  NOAA.
And that NOAA will be free.
Though as you know, finding things that NOAA hosts is not easy

I know the reverse is the reverse. I.e. You can get North American forecasts from  ECMWF, but they charge for it. I think ECMWF charges for basically everything, and NOAA for basically (literally?) nothing.
